product_name: Bending Branches Bounce X-Grip Kayak Paddle
long_description: Offering great value, the durable Bending Branches Bounce kayak paddle gets you out on the water having fun with a minimum of fuss. Rigid aluminum alloy shaft provides years of responsive performance; bright yellow grip area reduces slipping. Polypropylene blades provide excellent durability when pushing off rocks or barnacles. Dihedral curve and asymmetrical power face eliminate blade flutter. Feathering is adjustable to 0 or 60deg, with left- or right-hand control. The Bending Branches Bounce kayak paddle helps keep your lap dry thanks to its heavy-duty rubber drip rings.
short_description: Offering great value, the durable Bending Branches Bounce kayak paddle gets you out on the water having fun with a minimum of fuss.
